get.summary: Gets Articles for a Card
get.description: Returns a list of Articles based on the Card ID.

get.summary: Gets Articles for a Collection
get.description: Returns a list of Articles based on the collection ID

get.summary: Gets Articles for an Exhibit
get.description: Returns a list of Articles based on the exhibit's current move and current inject.

get.summary: Gets a specific Article by id
get.description: Returns the Article with the id specified

put.description:
Updates a Article with the attributes specified.
The ID from the route MUST MATCH the ID contained in the article parameter
<para />
Accessible only to a ContentDeveloper or an Administrator

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The Id of the Article to update

requestBody.description: The updated Article values

delete.description:
Deletes an Article with the specified id
<para />
Accessible only to a ContentDeveloper or an Administrator

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the Article to delete

post.description:
Creates a new Article with the attributes specified
<para />
Accessible only to a ContentDeveloper or an Administrator

requestBody.description: The data used to create the Article

parameters.description: The Id of the Exericse to update

delete.description:
Deletes a Permission with the specified id
<para />
Accessible only to a SuperUser or a User on an Admin Team within the specified Permission

parameters.description: The id of the Permission to delete
